Gaunt:
     "Then, with your permission," He said, "I return to my quarters."
     He left the bridge and went to his room, very sparse. He "slept" with his triple barrel gun on his chest, hand resting near it.
 aerosmith60@... wrote:Blackheart turned to Gaunt. "All in due time old friend. Youve known me long enough to know not to go in without one. We will hold position around past earth's moon so we can scan and investigate further. The we will proceed accordingly. Now rest easy its a long trip."
